snippet: About 780,000 RAV4 sport utility vehicles and Lexus HS sedans needed repairs for a handling problem in 2012, but the repair was not effective, the automaker said.
lead_paragraph: About 780,000 RAV4 sport utility vehicles and Lexus HS sedans needed repairs for a handling problem in 2012, but the repair was not effective, the automaker said.

headline.main: Toyota Recalls Vehicles a Second Time
headline.print_headline: Toyota Recalls Vehicles a Second Time
